EmailTemplate.name: Important: Upcoming Product Name Change in Salesforce
EmailTemplate.subject: Important: 'Subscription - Aura Enterprise' Product Has Been Renamed in Salesforce
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
Hello Salesforce Users!
This alert is intended for those who add products to opportunities in Salesforce and/or use reports where 'Subscription - Aura Enterprise' product name is referenced in the filters.
**WHAT YOU NEED TO KNOW**
The product name of 'Aura Enterprise' is officially changing to 'Neo4j - AuraDB'. This change HAS BEEN reflected in Salesforce TODAY.
This change HAS IMPACTED any report that references ''Subscription - Aura Enterprise' in its filters -- the product records are now omitted from the report results.
If you have not done this already, please update the filters of your key reports that have been impacted. You can do so by going into your report filters and replacing the string 'Subscription - Aura Enterprise' with 'Neo4j - AuraDB'.
Please let us know if you have any questions by reaching out to us at salesforce@neo4j.com.
Thank you, Salesforce Team
